nodes.text: Game Go was a business in the city of Pons Ora on the planet Abafar. It was marked with a signature sign reading "GAME GO" in Aurebesh. Game Go was located next to Admiral Snackbar and was across the street from Dr. Evazan Cosmetic Surgery.
Game Go first appeared in "Missing in Action," the twelfth episode in the fifth season of Star Wars: The Clone Wars.
